original_text: Also take with you every sort of food that is eaten, and store it up. It shall serve as food for you and for them.”
korean_text: 너는 먹을 모든 양식을 네게로 가져다가 저축하라 이것이 너와 그들의 먹을 것이 되리라

sentences.original_text: Also take with you every sort of food that is eaten
sentences.korean_translation: 또 너는 먹는 모든 종류의 음식을 가져가라

sentences.original_text: It shall serve as food for you
